```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
Car_details_v3 <- read_csv("Car details v3.csv")
Car_details_v3 =Car_details_v3[complete.cases(Car_details_v3), ]
years = 2020 - Car_details_v3$year

carData = cbind(years,Car_details_v3)

keeps <- c("years", "selling_price", "km_driven" )
my_carData = carData[keeps]

ml <- lm(selling_price ~ . , data = my_carData )

summary(ml)


anova(ml)

plot(ml)

vcov(ml)

vif(ml)

confint(ml, level = 0.95)



```
